data.text: @kaephesten The world's experience says you're wrong.
@LongCovidNews My experience tells me it's meaningless, though

@kaephesten You've been provided with definitive proof that long Covid is neither "useless" or "meaningless" to the patient or their experience. 
The global patients groups are proof of that too.
@LongCovidNews I'm not referring to usefulness. I'm referring to patient experience.

@kaephesten You're not very bright: "It's funny because he's pretty much saying the same thing as me"

Which, as we both agree, he isn't. You claimed it was "useless" and "meaningless".
@LongCovidNews I didn't claim he's saying it's useless. I'm the one who thinks that.

@kaephesten If you're saying that he's saying the same thing to you you clearly did not understand the words "useless" and "meaningless" when you used them, because he is not saying that. 
No one is denying there are issues, but long Covid is not as you claim.

@LongCovidNews It's funny because he's pretty much saying the same thing as me: https://t.co/ugKEAMiAVj

I'm just saying that the term is useless until we actually fix this, as well as adding that to say whether someone is sick should actually take into account whether they FEEL sick.

@kaephesten It's already been pulled apart as a waste of everyone time 
https://t.co/WaMFRqnZWP
